title: Tending to our emotions and relationships during coronavirus
itunes:author: David B. Feldman - psychology | social science | politics | mental health
itunes:summary: Given how isolated many of us feel during "shelter in place," I thought I'd mix things up a bit my inviting a guest onto the show. I talk with psychologist Dr. Adam Dorsay about feelings and relationships in the midst of the outbreak.

description: Given how isolated many of us feel during "shelter in place," I thought I'd mix things up a bit my inviting a guest onto the show. I talk with psychologist Dr. Adam Dorsay about feelings and relationships in the midst of the outbreak.
